channel.title: YangYang (杨杨) - Homepage
channel.description: YangYang's Homepage, computer technology MS student at South-Central Minzu University, focusing on Multimodal Medical Image Analysis and Computer Vision

item.title: Outstanding Graduate Student Award
item.description: Yang Yang was awarded the Outstanding Graduate Student for master's students in September 2025.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: First-class Academic Scholarship
item.description: Yang Yang received the First-class Academic Scholarship for master's students (TOP 1).
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: TexStudio: OCR mathematical formula recognition
item.description: A modern LaTeX formula recognition desktop application built with TypeScript and Electron.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: HSFPN-Det: An Effective Model for Detecting Rice Pests and Diseases
item.description: A novel deep learning model for rice pest and disease detection, currently under review at The Visual Computer journal. Authors: Yang Yang, Yuxin Hong, Wenjie Yu, Xiao Zhang, Bo Yang, Meng Shi, Yangguang Sun, Jun Wang, Jianlin Zhu.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: An Improved YOLOv8-Based Rice Pest and Disease Detection Method
item.description: We propose an improved YOLOv8-based method for accurate detection of rice pests and diseases. Published in Computer Graphics International Conference (CGI) 2024. Authors: Yang Yang, Jianlin Zhu, Bo Yang, Xiao Zhang, Jin Huang.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: Rice Pest and Disease Detection System
item.description: An intelligent system for automated detection and classification of rice pests and diseases using deep learning techniques.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: CGI2024 Conference Talk - An Improved YOLOv8-Based Rice Pest and Disease Detection Method
item.description: Presented our novel approach for rice pest and disease detection using improved YOLOv8 architecture at the International Conference on Computer Graphics (CGI), 2024.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)
